Settings.$comment: ATTENTION: This schema file is auto-updated on every build, you don't need to edit it manually.

alwaysUseTextEditor.description: Always use a text editor for files instead of the inspector.

defaultAuthor.description: The default author of new projects.

defaultProjectFolder.description: The default folder to place new projects in.

defaultProjectName.description: The default name of new projects.

minify.description: Whether to minify all json files when building the project

modManagerPath.description: The path to the Outer Wilds Mod Manager config directory (the folder with settings.json in it), used to launch the game and output the mod.

schemaBranch.description: The branch to use for schemas, set to `main` for stable builds, and `dev` for nightly builds. Check the GitHub repo for other names. (Reload Required)
